name: amigurumi chubby bunny
notes:
this is a free pattern available on my blog!

full video tutorial can be found on my youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=al9gf55ctue


springtime is here which means all the flowers are blooming and new life is popping out for the first time in months! i knew i had to make a small and chubby bunny to celebrate my favorite time of the year. i picked out a few of my favorite spring colors but these could be made in any color youâ€™d like! there are endless possibilities!

this bunny is super quick to whip up and includes step by step photos to help you along as you make your bunny!

pattern difficulty: beginner

pattern is written in english, with us crochet terminology.

materials needed

worsted weight acrylic yarn
size e/3.5mm crochet hook
9mm plastic safety eyes
polyester fiberfill stuffing 
stitch maker
yarn needle
scissors
straight pins

skills needed

magic ring
single crochet
increase
invisible decrease

finished measurement:
4 inches wide and 5 inches tall
